keepConnect.name: Stayd kianglagh
keepConnect.helperText: Mannagh click oo er y link Start, gow y linney. Ta shen goaill stiagh dy bee y link ry-cheilley dy kinjagh erreish da ve disconnected.

url.helperText: URL ceaghley, myr sampleyr, ws://192.0.2:7001, ny wws://s'coontey
url.error: Ta'n URL cheddin ry-akin lesh ws:// ny wwws://
